file_content.text: That's far enough, thank you.
I doubt even the Force can stop me from pulling this trigger. Best not to try.
Jedi should recognize an inferior bargaining position when they see it, yes?
Havoc Squad... I'm honored, but I've been trained to neutralize superior forces.
I recommend you tread carefully, Captain. I'm not the Voidwolf, and this isn't some outlaw showdown.
I have no quarrel with Republic heroes. Be reasonable.
Please, the next groundquake could destroy this mesa--kill us all!
Then let's keep the negotiations brief, hmm? We've done no harm to these people. All we seek is the droid's isotope-5 power supply.
No time for debate. Let us have the isotope-5, or we'll be forced to execute the prisoners. I'm sure no one wants that.
My only interest is saving lives. Leave quickly, and there'll be no need for violence.
A Jedi committed to peace--how refreshing. Men, gather what we came for....
I came here to save lives, not end them. Since you haven't hurt anyone, I can afford to be merciful.
I knew I could trust you to see the light, Master Jedi. Men, it's time we were going....
You Imps are the least of my worries right now. Get out of here.
I appreciate your ability to see the larger picture. Come on, men....
Can't have you shooting innocent people. That'd be downright inconsiderate.
Indeed. Let us not overstay our welcome. Men....
Whatever your mission is, it ended the moment you crossed me. Drop your weapons or die.
No deal.
We cannot return empty-handed. If we must die, it will be as soldiers.
Kill them!
Fine, you can go.
Thought we were deader than a depleted reactor. Thanks--I'm sure it wasn't easy letting those Imperials go.
The Republic doesn't throw away its people just to win an argument.
It was the right thing to do.
Had my doubts when Shalim pledged Makeb to you folks, but I've got no complaints now.
Bad enough we're fighting a lunatic Hutt--now the Empire's here, too?
What is the Empire doing here?
Maybe no one told them the planet's coming apart.
If the Empire gains an advantage because you let yourselves be captured, I'm holding you responsible.
I'd better not regret it.
I'm a mayor. I'm used to being blamed when things go wrong.
We'd better get moving.
I'll tell Shalim to expect wounded.
Mayor, good to see you alive. I trust everything is under control?
Listen, Shalim--an Imperial strike team was just here. They stole a sample of isotope-5.
The Empire is on Makeb.
How do they even know it exists? One more thing to worry about....
This mesa's falling apart under our feet, and we've got wounded. We need a destination for these people right away.
Not even remotely.
The only reason there's anyone alive at all is because I was here. How did you people survive before I came along?
Yes, thanks to me.
It was a bit simpler before the Hutts took over.
We're evacuating Tarlam and bringing the wounded with us.
We'll have medics standing by at the refugee center, Mayor. Take your people there.
I've set up a new camp near the ark construction site--you have the coordinates. Meet me to plot our next move.
We'll be there soon, Shalim. Do you have a plan in mind?
On my way.
Have you received any reports of other places under attack by Toborro?
Are any other towns in danger?
No. I think you embarrassed him.
Let's finish this while Toborro thinks he has the upper hand. Where is that fat slug?
But I want to hit Toborro now.
No one wants Toborro more than me, but we can't go at him blindly.
The Republic sent down a top engineer to review the ark schematics. He's made some interesting discoveries. Hurry.
What does the Empire know about isotope-5?
Explain why.
Mayor, is this Imperial telling the truth? None of your people were injured in the attack?
You truly haven't hurt anyone?
You're not taking anything. We destroyed that droid--we're keeping whatever's inside.
No, isotope-5 belongs to us.
You misunderstand my position. I don't know what that substance is, nor do I care. I'm simply following orders to recover samples.
Just a few bumps and bruises to get our attention. Don't much care for having a blaster stuck at my head, though.
He's not bluffing. He'll kill me.
No survivors!
We can win this!
The Empire will avenge me....
